title: WHIRLING F1 / MAN WITH SUNGLASSES ESPRIT RC

dialogueTree.title: Esprit de Corps: "You *know* what it is. It's like th..."
dialogueTree.text: You *know* what it is. It's like the two of you know each other. Just ask him.

links.title: You: ""Tell me the truth, do you know me..."
links.text: "Tell me the truth, do you know me from somewhere?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, I definitely know you from *so..."
links.text: "Oh, I definitely know you from *somewhere*."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Another life..."
links.text: Another life...

links.title: You: ""From where? From another life?""
links.text: "From where? From another life?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yes. From another life. A differen..."
links.text: "Yes. From another life. A different life. Maybe the life of a police officer belonging to the ranks of the..." He pauses.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""To what station do you think you w..."
links.text: "To what station do you think you would belong in this alternate and totally fictional reality?"

links.title: You: ""Forty-first?""
links.text: "Forty-first?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay, okay!" The man sounds genuin..."
links.text: "Okay, okay!" The man sounds genuinely excited. "That's plausible. That's entirely plausible. Now we're really getting somewhere..." He gives you a long, meaningful look and adds:

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""...somewhere *good*.""
links.text: "...somewhere *good*."

links.title: You: ""Fifty-seventh?""
links.text: "Fifty-seventh?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think even in this *fictional* r..."
links.text: "I think even in this *fictional* reality, the 57th would still be *my* station." The lieutenant makes a little nod towards the man with sunglasses.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""My condolences," the man with sung..."
links.text: "My condolences," the man with sunglasses replies dryly.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Go ahead," he nods. "Have another..."
links.text: "Go ahead," he nods. "Have another guess."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Good job, that was very close." He..."
links.text: "Good job, that was very close." He now speaks with the tone of a mother helping her kid take first steps. "Maybe try again?"

links.title: You: ""Sixty-nine.""
links.text: "Sixty-nine."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "He seems to be observing you throug..."
links.text: He seems to be observing you through the reflective glass of his eye-wear. There's no reply. Perhaps repeat it?

links.title: You: ""Sixty-nine.""
links.text: "Sixty-nine."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "Repeating it gets no reaction from..."
links.text: Repeating it gets no reaction from the man with sunglasses. Suddenly the world is very quiet. Even the howling wind outside sounds a bit embarrassed.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""That's..." The man looks extremely..."
links.text: "That's..." The man looks extremely surprised. "...exactly right! Down to a fraction."

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No, not really." He let's the sile..."
links.text: "No, not really." He let's the silence drag out.

links.title: You: ""No need for the sarcasm.""
links.text: "No need for the sarcasm."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I don't even know what to say to t..."
links.text: "I don't even know what to say to that..." he shakes his head. "What is your god damn station?"

links.title: You: ""Never mind, this is stupid.""
links.text: "Never mind, this is stupid."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Stupid is a gross understatement."..."
links.text: "Stupid is a gross understatement." You feel his eyes behind the shades mapping you out.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""How about 41? How does 41st sound?..."
links.text: "How about 41? How does 41st sound?" He shakes his head. "Never mind, I'm not going along with this..."

dialogueTree.title: Esprit de Corps: "There's something that binds you to..."
dialogueTree.text: There's something that binds you to him. Some kind of an outfit maybe...? A uniform!

links.title: You: "A firefighters uniform?"
links.text: A firefighters uniform?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Exactomundo!"
links.text: Exactomundo!

links.title: You: ""I'm going to ask you straight: are..."
links.text: "I'm going to ask you straight: are you or have you ever been a firefighter?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Well that depends," the man with s..."
links.text: "Well that depends," the man with sunglasses says tilting his head. "Define *fire*."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Stop it, Jean..." she says quietly..."
links.text: "Stop it, Jean..." she says quietly and turns to you. "No, he has never been a firefighter. No one here is a firefighter."

links.title: You: "I don't think he's a firefighter. I..."
links.text: I don't think he's a firefighter. I'm not gonna ask that.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Of course, you don't have to. You c..."
links.text: Of course, you don't have to. You can talk about anything you want.

links.title: You: "An animal control uniform?"
links.text: An animal control uniform?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The police of animals, yes!"
links.text: The police of animals, yes!

links.title: You: ""Listen, don't make anything out of..."
links.text: "Listen, don't make anything out of it, but do you work for Animal Control?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Well, I *am* interacting with the..."
links.text: "Well, I *am* interacting with the most dangerous animal of them all -- you -- I'd say yes. I'm animal control."

links.title: You: ""You think I'm dangerous?""
links.text: "You think I'm dangerous?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""To yourself -- yes, extremely.""
links.text: "To yourself -- yes, extremely."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "She sighs and looks at you with som..."
links.text: She sighs and looks at you with something akin to compassion in her eyes. "Can we help you with something?"

links.title: You: ""You're making fun of me.""
links.text: "You're making fun of me."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh you know me... always the joker..."
links.text: "Oh you know me... always the joker -- just can't but see the bright side." He's doing a weird dance imitation with his elbows. "Guess I'm just pathologically a *glass is half-full* kind of guy."

links.title: You: ""Weren't you depressed or something?""
links.text: "Weren't you depressed or something?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Seven years and going strong!" He..."
links.text: "Seven years and going strong!" He nods enthusiastically. "The head doctors are now calling it a medical marvel... no, wait, anomaly was the word they used."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""But as you're still staring at me..."
links.text: "But as you're still staring at me like a calf stares at a freshly made gate... I assume there was something else."

links.title: You: ""Whatever works for you.""
links.text: "Whatever works for you."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Nothing *works* for me, that's the..."
links.text: "Nothing *works* for me, that's the problem, buddy." He closes his eyes and rubs his forehead. "Whatever, I don't really care."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, you're still here," he says, o..."
links.text: "Oh, you're still here," he says, opening his eyes. "Must have had something really important for me?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "This guy is suffering from clinical..."
links.text: This guy is suffering from clinical depression. And it's been going on awhile.

links.title: You: "That doesn't sound right. I don't w..."
links.text: That doesn't sound right. I don't wanna say it.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Of course, you don't have to. You c..."
links.text: Of course, you don't have to. You can talk about anything you want.

links.title: You: "A nurse's uniform?"
links.text: A nurse's uniform?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Yes. Nurses, why not..."
links.text: Yes. Nurses, why not...

links.title: You: ""This is going to sound really weir..."
links.text: "This is going to sound really weird, but are you by any chance... a male nurse?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Why yes..." His eyes peer over the..."
links.text: "Why yes..." His eyes peer over the sunglasses. "Yes, I am a male nurse -- how could you tell?"

links.title: You: ""I see into the ether... that's how..."
links.text: "I see into the ether... that's how I know things."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, you've done a lot more with et..."
links.text: "Oh, you've done a lot more with ether than just *look into it*." He leans back and mumbles: "This was stupid, I shouldn't have..."

links.title: You: ""Uh... really?""
links.text: "Uh... really?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No, not really," he replies with t..."
links.text: "No, not really," he replies with the familiar fake enthusiasm. "Not really at all! Now *please* go sort this hanging out, alright?"

links.title: You: ""Could you take a look at me? I've..."
links.text: "Could you take a look at me? I've been through a lot lately."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, I wish I could, I wish I could..."
links.text: "Oh, I wish I could, I wish I could..." he spreads his arms and shrugs. "Unfortunately I'm a neck and chin nurse. What you need is a head nurse. Sorry I couldn't help you out, buddy."

links.title: Rhetoric: "That there is a form of severe sarc..."
links.text: That there is a form of severe sarcasm... and he's not actually a nurse.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""You can sometimes be a real asshol..."
links.text: "You can sometimes be a real asshole, you know that?" Surprisingly, the words don't seem to be directed at you.

links.title: You: "He's not a male nurse. I'm not gonn..."
links.text: He's not a male nurse. I'm not gonna ask that.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Of course, you don't have to. You c..."
links.text: Of course, you don't have to. You can talk about anything you want.

links.title: You: "I understand, the *uniform* is meta..."
links.text: I understand, the *uniform* is metaphorical -- I'm actually seeing the working class, right?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Uh... I want to say... yes? I think..."
links.text: Uh... I want to say... yes? I think.

links.title: You: ""Level with me here for a second......"
links.text: "Level with me here for a second... are you *working class*?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Fucking *politics* again... You kn..."
links.text: "Fucking *politics* again... You know what I'm more interested in?"

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You solving the case you're on." H..."
links.text: "You solving the case you're on." He takes a quick breath. "I'm passionate about that. So maybe -- get to it?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""Me solving the case of the hanged..."
links.text: "Me solving the case of the hanged man?"

links.title: You: "I don't wanna ask that."
links.text: I don't wanna ask that.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Then don't. No one's forcing you."
links.text: Then don't. No one's forcing you.
